title: Fireside with the Underboss - "John Gotti Paid $100K To Have Me And Three Others Killed"
description: After just getting out of prison, Sammy gets word that John has put a price on his head. The guy he paid to do it, Cornfed, was a part of the notorious AB gang and luckily - he was also a friend of Sammys.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: After just getting out of prison, Sammy gets word that John has put a price on his head. The guy he paid to do it, Cornfed, was a part of the notorious AB gang and luckily - he was also a friend of Sammys.
